Select_Language: Choose the appropriate language for the order
How_to_receive_the_product: What method of receiving the product do you prefer?
Choose_a_branchs: Choose one of the following branches:
To_return_to_the_main: To return to the main send 0
Near_Narcos_Burger_branch: Your nearest Narcos Burger branch is available to serve you now
return_to_the_previous_stage: To return to the previous stage, send 00
Use_the_link: Please use the link to confirm the order.
delete_product: Select the product number to delete:
send_the_location: Send your location so that we can help you find the nearest branch to you
